```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Load Packages
```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, caret, tidymodels, DataExplorer, rpart, rattle)
```

## Load Data
```{r}
df_test <- read.csv("test.csv")
df_train <- read.csv("train.csv")
```

## Explore Data
```{r}
df_train_exp <- df_train %>% select(-c(lnwage, ID))

df_train_int_2 <- t(apply(df_train_exp, 1, combn, 2, prod)) %>% as_tibble()
colnames(df_train_int_2) <- combn(colnames(df_train_exp), 2, paste, collapse="_x_")
df_train_int <- cbind(df_train, df_train_int_2) %>% select(-ID)

```
